pkgmetadata.longdescription:
bbtools is a package of 4 small tools written by Brent Beyeler.
bbdmux: an MPEG-1 or MPEG-2 program/transport stream de-multiplexer bbinfo: an MPEG-1 or MPEG-2 program/transport stream analyzer bbvinfo: an MPEG-1 or MPEG-2 video stream analyzer bbainfo: an MPEG-1 audio stream analyzer
